cause.description:
HELP STOP...Aids and other sexually transmitted diseases from being contracted. HELP STOP...Unplanned Pregnancy's...SO that there is no need to have an Abortion or do anything drastic, or go through a time of Depression and Feeling like a Failure.
This is a cause so that people can see that if you keep yourself sexually pure until marriage. Things will be enjoyable after marriage. If you believe keeping yourself pure is the way to HELP these problems join it. If you have made some mistakes but you believe this is true to you now join it as well... Lets STOP these things that are happening to some of our friends, family, and children.
1. Health Is important for our Future.
2. Lets give lives not take them away.
cause.name: Keeping Yourself Sexually Pure Until Marriage (Please read first )
